snippet.title: Scraps: Modular Vehicle Combat - Pre-alpha gameplay trailer
snippet.description:
Scraps is now available to purchase!  https://store.steampowered.com/app/350150/Scraps_Modular_Vehicle_Combat/

Scraps is a vehicle combat game where you build a vehicle from parts, and where success lies just as much in designing a well-crafted vehicle as in your combat skills. It's about competitive creativity, and having fun while making horrible design decisions.

This is early in-development footage of the game. Check out the website above for the latest.

Song is one of mine, When I Rule The World. Free download: https://billborman.bandcamp.com/album/scraps-modular-vehicle-combat-soundtrack
